actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, LabelEncoder
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from xgboost import XGBClassifier
from lightgbm import LGBMClassifier
from catboost import CatBoostClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
# 1. Create family size (SibSp + Parch)
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# 2. Create is_alone binary feature
train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# 3. Extract title from Name (e.g., Mr, Mrs, Miss, Master)
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_mapping = {
        'Mr': 'Mr',
        'Mrs': 'Mrs',
        'Miss': 'Miss',
        'Master': 'Master',
        'Dr': 'Dr',
        'Rev': 'Other',
        'Col': 'Other',
        'Major': 'Other',
        'Mlle': 'Other',
        'Countess': 'Other',
        'Jonkheer': 'Other',
        'Lady': 'Other',
        'Don': 'Other',
        'Sir': 'Other',
        'Capt': 'Other'
    }
    return title_mapping.get(title, 'Other')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# 4. Encode titles (categorical)
title_le = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Title'] = title_le.fit_transform(train_df['Title'])
test_df['Title'] = title_le.transform(test_df['Title'])

# 5. Encode Embarked (categorical)
embarked_le = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Embarked'] = embarked_le.fit_transform(train_df['Embarked'])
test_df['Embarked'] = embarked_le.transform

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from xgboost import XGBClassifier
from lightgbm import LGBMClassifier
from catboost import CatBoostClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
# 1. Create family size (SibSp + Parch)
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# 2. Create is_alone binary feature
train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# 3. Extract title from Name (e.g., Mr, Mrs, Miss, Master)
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_mapping = {
        'Mr': 'Mr',
        'Mrs': 'Mrs',
        'Miss': 'Miss',
        'Master': 'Master',
        'Dr': 'Dr',
        'Rev': 'Other',
        'Col': 'Other',
        'Major': 'Other',
        'Mlle': 'Other',
        'Countess': 'Other',
        'Jonkheer': 'Other',
        'Lady': 'Other',
        'Don': 'Other',
        'Sir': 'Other',

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, LabelEncoder
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from xgboost import XGBClassifier
from lightgbm import LGBMClassifier
from catboost import CatBoostClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
# 1. Create family size (SibSp + Parch)
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# 2. Create is_alone binary feature
train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# 3. Extract title from Name (e.g., Mr, Mrs, Miss, Master)
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_mapping = {
        'Mr': 'Mr',
        'Mrs': 'Mrs',
        'Miss': 'Miss',
        'Master': 'Master',
        'Dr': 'Dr',
        'Rev': 'Other',
        'Col': 'Other',
        'Major': 'Other',
        'Mlle': 'Other',
        'Countess': 'Other',
        'Jonkheer': 'Other',
        'Lady': 'Other',
        'Don': 'Other',
        'Sir': 'Other',
        'Capt': 'Other'
    }
    return title_mapping.get(title, 'Other')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# 4. Encode titles (categorical)
title_le = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Title'] = title_le.fit_transform(train_df['Title'])
test_df['Title'] = title_le.transform(test_df['Title'])

# 5. Encode Embarked (categorical)
embarked_le = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Embarked'] = embarked_le.fit_transform(train_df['Embarked'])
test_df['Embarked'] = embarked_le.transform
